response.original_title: Slide America: A Look Inside The White-Knuckled, Tire-Melting World Of Drifting
response.overview: See how the gutsiest street drivers burn rubber in the 21st century with this look at drifting, the art of racing a specially modified car sideways -- at maximum velocity. Strap yourself in to explore the high-octane phenomenon that's become one of the fastest-growing -- and most perilous -- motor sports in America. Meet the drivers at the forefront of the sport and witness incredible racing footage from competitions all over the country.
response.title: Slide America: A Look Inside The White-Knuckled, Tire-Melting World Of Drifting
